title: High ping issue
body: Some games i will have a perfect 40 ping and others its around 200 all game, this only happens in league of legends, every other game I play is perfectly fine, any ideas on what it could be?

replies.body: Lag spikes like this can be caused by a connection issue with your network or packet loss.  Whenever you have time, please run a [Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)which can help look for any issues and provide a series of troubleshooting steps.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up but please let me know if you continue to experience any issues.

Thanks for following up with me!  Hit up our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to help out further, and gather the following set of logs which will help provide more context:

[Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 

* For the secondary category, select **I’m lagging more than normal**

Include a Tracert in the request as well. Details on how to obtain one in the "Logs"  link below. 

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HCCc9VGLMBs/VvGim_HT2MI/AAAAAAAA5EU/CQi6aIgFrm0rtxw5hZl4Al3mMP3k3JAyg/s1600/Lissandra_Splash_3.jpg


[Need help obtaining logs? Soraka will be your aide!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

https://static2.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/57010692ced3c.jpg
